displaytitle: Antony Giving the Library of Pergamum to Cleopatra
medium: Pen and brown ink and brush and brown wash with traces of black chalk
creditline: Bequest of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
markings: Stamp in black, lower left (partially abraded): WYO [monogram] [Lugt 2662]
inscribed: Inscribed in brown ink, across lower edge: m. Antonio donna la libraria di Pergamo (…)

titles.title: Antony Giving the Library of Pergamum to Cleopatra

texts.textentryhtml:
William Young Ottley; Este Gallery, New York (as “French, seventeenth century”); purchased in 1958
by Joseph F. McCrindle;

caption: Francesco Allegrini (Italian, 1615/1620 - after 1679), Antony Giving the Library of Pergamum to Cleopatra. Pen and brown ink and brush and brown wash with traces of black chalk; 9.3 × 13.6 cm. Bequest of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection (2008-362)
